org.GameLogic.Communication

Interface CommunicationHandlerCallback

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    CommunicationHandler, GameHandlerTest.ComHandler

    public interface CommunicationHandlerCallback
    This interface does structure the responses that are generated by asynchronous events in the GameHandler
